entry.title: 558: Big Zuck Energy
entry.summary: We embrace the dad bod lifestyle and find out if Apple's Vision Pro demo sold Mike, and Chris is picking up on what the Zuck is putting down.

entry.title: 550: Ready Player Linux
entry.summary: Chris spends the week in a VR desktop, revealing the glitches, gains, and VR's open-source future.

entry.title: 557: Betting it all on Green
entry.summary: Why we think Nvidia has become one of the most valuable companies in the world, Sam's new "mind boggling" idea, and more.

entry.title: 549: Will it Nixcloud?
entry.summary: Deploying Nextcloud the Nix way promises a paradise of reproducibility and simplicity. But is it just a painful trek through configuration hell? We built the dream Nextcloud using Nix and faced reality. Special Guest: Alex Kretzschmar.

entry.title: 556: Facial Computing
entry.summary: Chris tries out Spatial Computing using a $3,200 trick, and Mike has a Rails treat you won't want to miss.

entry.title: 548: Uncomfortable Linux Truths
entry.summary: Some uncomfortable truths about using Linux, and then we introduce a new segment: Will it Nix?

entry.title: 555: It's Good to be the King
entry.summary: If you're going to come at the king, you better not miss; now it's Apple's turn to make everyone feel pain. And our spicy take on why AI saftey is really about stopping a movment.

entry.title: 547: Behind the Shelves
entry.summary: Data-hoard with purpose and manage your audiobooks and podcasts with one application, plus the lone Linux box that remains on Mars.
